text: Deutsches Theater is the name of several theatres which were founded to promote German language and literature, oftentimes in the 19th century as counterparts to Italian operas: *Deutsches Theater (Berlin) *Deutsches Theater (Göttingen) *Deutsches Theater (Hanover) *Deutsches Theater (Munich) *Deutsches Theater (Oslo) It's also the former name of the following theatres: *State Opera (Prague) *Hoogduitse Schouwburg, Amsterdam
title: Deutsches Theater
